title: ARURF is the definition of unfun
body: Imagine being at the mercy of an RNG. That is why I don't play TFT (but that's for another time). Riot thinks that playing urf against the same champions every game is stale and boring so they introduced random champions. Unfortunately every time I see ARURF there seems to be a specific champion pool decreasing diversity. Every game is still the same matchup but now it's a boring matchup defined by riot. in URF I'd see one champion strong for a day then overnight a different character is found to be even stronger. Now in ARURF it's a stale same champions are strong. I used to see almost every character be tried in URF (even losing to a 50/3 adc ivern) now its just... shaco turns invisible runs around the map and murders everyone. I'd really like to see the diversity brought back through URF, where every champion is built every possible way to see what is strong and what is not.

replies.body: Honestly if Im gonna be brutalized by broken champs Id rather it be when I play a champ I actually wanna play.
URF has never been fun.

The only problem with ARURF compared to URF is that it doesn't have a ban phase, and I think it desperately  needs to have a ban phase before distributing the champs.
If its not fun for you, then don't play it. No amount of bans is gonna save you from the amount of champs that are busted on AURF. Unless we got like 3 bans per person.

at least in normal URF I can fight back broken with broken. In URF I'll end up with some garbage I might never normally play that isn't that great into some dude feeding Yi 20 kills then I can't do anything the rest of the game and it just feels miserable as I don't like the champ I'm playing and I'm getting crap stomped.

To be honest, Im fed up with both variants. It's like 2 or 3 special modes a year and poro king, and urf variants are overused.
I want starguardian, dark star thresh and all for one. Or some other new creations of riot.

Dont know how many of you were playing on first and best URF but that was time when RIOT cared. 

You had 3 bans on each team plus they (riot)  banned few broken champs like heca. 

Also that was of the best shows riot make with two legendary teams: YOLO vs. SWAG 

If you havw time go watch it.
can only have fun with my best buddy because we just mess around so much, we dont care if we get stomped.

Its mjust going to be the same thing over and over {{champion:12}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:99}} and you cant ban and if you can you cant ban them all to have a little variety. then at that point if you dont want to pick the top tier picks youre just gonna try and have fun playing the champs you want to play and get relentlessly shit on but the insanely broken shit every game. 

Either way you get it whether its RNG or picks you still get a really annoying negative theres just really no way around it
I hate getting tanks and bruisers in URF. I had Evelynn like 3 times now aswell.
I literally played against Yummi 3 times in a row. That's so fun.

Im always surprised when people want Urf back. It was fun for the first couple days before people started spamming Sona and Ez and shit. I would love to just sit there and have fun but Urf is basically Summoners Rift right now: You die in 0.2 seconds. Back when the game was actually about strategy, the thought of spamming abilities and watching people melt was fun. Now its not fun, its boring, because this is basically how the base game feels now. So I can't help but be irritated that I can't do anything without insta-dying to something way more OP than everything else. The random-ness of it solved the lack of diversity but now i can't even pick a champion i want to try. I get champs I dont want to play that are borderline useless in URF.
Played against Fizz, had so much fun seeing him perma untouchable due his E, with perma mobility which u couldn't escape, would't have played this trash game mode if mission didn't force me to.

Nothing beats the stalenes of normal URF, oh you want to see the same 10 champions every game? URF's got you covered!

And no bans won't help, when URF first got introduced for about 3 days you saw all sorts of champions in the game, after that however people figured out were the most OP champions and you saw them every single game, people complaiend about it of course because seeing the same 10 champions every single match is just boring and frustrating so riot disabled about 20 champions, result? you now saw the next 10 most OP champions every match, this is why we can only have ARURF, because people don't give a shit about playing fun champions they only care about playing OP champion.

And don't you dare come to me with ''they really just like playing those champions'' do you know how often urgot and evelyn were seen in summoners rift? once in a 1000 games perhaps, know how often they were seen in URF? every single match.
watch the boards post the same thing when urf hits and then it'll be "URF ruined by OP pick. please bring back arurf"
You only see 14 champs in ARURF or URF anyways. Honestly need to get rid of the game mode as a whole and think of something new. Which i think they're doing anyways.
you know what is unfun? taking this game too seriously and competitively. seriously just stop that. this is a game, not a sport. esports don't mean shit.

ARURF unfun? Don't play ARURF.

Wanna play URF? Convince them that URF is a good idea in itself. Bashing on ARURF won't help.
